name: The Alaknanda River Rafting Expedition
description: Traverse through the highs and the lows of rapturous rivers and enchanting landscapes with the Alaknanda river expedition. Camp with Chillout that lolls on the mystical banks of River Ganges. Prep up with Srinagar, steeped in natural beauty. Navigate gushing milky waters at Devprayag and end the exhilarating rafting journey at the famous Rishikesh. Adding to the allure of the adventure are bonfire dinners and beach activities.
